com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.core

Interface Query

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MatlabMetropolisHastingsSolver, MetropolisHastingsSolver, PriorSolver, Solver

    public interface Query
    Interface implemented by Solvers and its subclasses, as well as other objects that can perform queries (ie. externally).

    BenL
